item.title: How Rails handles status codes
item.description: Recently, I have been building an API as part of my day job. Rails is a great framework to build APIs in, and it has been a joy so far. When building the responses of the API, it’s paramount to understand what HTTP statuses you should utilize, which will in return help the consumers by providing more meaningful responses. Sure, you could always have a status property in the response JSON, which will be a human-readable status code.
